metadata.synopsis: Warden runs out of her post to go after the prisoners.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load scl - speak to wulbren, persuade him that you're here to help, agree to get him tools - throw a hammer to him through the bars - tell wulbren to escape now. Wulbren and the gnomes will bust out the back wall, if they are spotted by the patrolling eyes it will trigger an alarm, the warden will run from her post to chase them and this will trigger.

0.speaker: The Warden
0.text: The prisoners are escaping! All arms to me - NOW.
0.context: NodeContext: Roaring with authority and fury
